properties.name: Road with Sidewalk, Bicycle Explicitly No on Sidewalk
Cycleway Lane (no side) on Oneway Road

This is an extremely long name for a cycleway to test if there are any field length limitations in the processing or output, which sometimes can be an issue with certain data formats or database schemas, though GeoJSON itself is quite flexible in this regard, but intermediate processing steps might not be.
